original_title: The Hand That Touches the Arm
overview: A compilation of scenes from classic Hollywood films, in which a man is touching a womanâ€™s elbow, attributes a deeper meaning to the simple gesture. It does not matter if the man is helping the woman to get on a train or if he is assaulting her; the gesture gradually becomes more and more sinister, emphasizing sexist subtext, ubiquitous in classic Hollywood cinema.
title: The Hand That Touches the Arm
